body:
Comment 5 by **ben@captainu.com**: 
I redownloaded the tarball (go1.1beta2.darwin-amd64.tar.gz) and verified the checksum
but I'm still getting:

go build command-line-arguments: signal: illegal instruction

I downloaded and built from source and that seems to work. Let me know if you need any
information from me about the tarball.
